title: EP#53 - Making Plans
itunes:title: EP#53 - Making Plans
description:
A group of trick-or-treaters meet up to discuss the big night-before things go horribly wrong. “Making Plans”, written and narrated by Jeremy John is from his new book The Strange Grave of Mikey Dunbar and Other Stories To Make You Poop Your Pants. Available wherever books are sold, from Dundern Press.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
